portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.content:
My Cases of Study focus on my thinking process and my ability to solve problems through design.

I am currently working on this section. In the meantime, you can see my work on PDFs:

projects.title: Blockchain Timestamp Tool
projects.content: Case of Study: I helped BFA to make a usable timestamp tool.

projects.title: The Web Through Me
projects.content: Case of Study: I’ve been in charge of Viñetas Sueltas' website since 2008 and this is that story.

projects.title: Visual Designs
projects.content: A mix of designs for large companies like Microsoft, Personal, Saks and T-Mobile.

projects.title: Top-Level Domain Opening
projects.content: Case of Study: I helped NIC Argentina to launch the opening of the top-level domain to users.

projects.title: Nearpod Image Quiz
projects.content: Case of Study: I helped Nearpod to design a new feature for the quiz activity.

projects.title: Reel
projects.content: You can watch my Motion Graphics Reel on Vimeo.
